Key.English: Place the Dynamic Weather module and choose between different climates! Find a high detailed set of adjustment options on the module to refine your mission!
Key.Chinesesimp: 放置动态天气模块和选择不同的气候,在模块上找到一组高度详细的调整选项来完善你的任务！

Key.English: Enables dynamic weather module debug mode
Key.Chinesesimp: 启用动态天气模块调试模式

Key.English: Delay in seconds between each rpt output (Enable Debug must be enabled)
Key.Chinesesimp: 每个rpt输出之间的延迟(以秒为单位)(必须启用“启用调试”)

Key.English: Only one dynamic weather module can be used
Key.Chinesesimp: 只能使用一个动态天气模块

Key.English: For a complete local explanation please refer to ALiVE wiki
Key.Chinesesimp: 有关完整的本地解释,请参考ALiVE wiki

Key.English: Set initial weather to one of the override settings
Key.Chinesesimp: 将初始天气设置为覆盖设置之一

Key.English: Amount of variance to weather between weather cycles
Key.Chinesesimp: 不同天气周期之间的天气变化量

Key.English: Time in seconds between each weather cycle (minimum 1800 set by game engine)
Key.Chinesesimp: 每个天气周期之间的时间(以秒为单位)(游戏引擎设置的最低1800秒)
真实地点天气(同步真实地点的天气情况?):

Key.English: For a complete list of valid Locales please refer to ALiVE wiki
Key.Chinesesimp: 有关有效区域设置的完整列表,请参阅ALiVE wiki
